-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema db_ris
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci ;
USE `db_ris` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`alerts`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`alerts` (
  `alert_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `alert_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`alert_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 3
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`appointments`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`appointments` (
  `appointment_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `patient` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `order_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `modality` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `date_time` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `radiologist` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `technician` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `phone_number` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `email_address` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `enrollee_name` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `enrollee_id` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `issuer` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `checked_in` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `closed` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`appointment_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 9
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`diagnostic_reports`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`diagnostic_reports` (
  `diagnostic_report_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `order_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `patient` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `radiologist` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `diagnostic` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`diagnostic_report_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 9
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`file_uploads`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`file_uploads` (
  `file_upload_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `order_id` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `file_name` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `file_type` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `is_active` BIT(1) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `upload_path` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`file_upload_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 33
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`imaging_info`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`imaging_info` (
  `imaging_id` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `image_url` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `imaging` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `modality` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `patient` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `technician` BIGINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`imaging_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`modalities`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`modalities` (
  `modality_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`modality_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 5
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`order_status`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`order_status` (
  `order_status_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`order_status_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 4
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`orders`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`orders` (
  `order_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `patient` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `referral_md` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `modality` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `appointment` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` VARCHAR(250) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `report` INT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`order_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 10
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`patients`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`patients` (
  `patient_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `first_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `last_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `dob` DATE NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `sex` VARCHAR(25) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `race` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `ethnicity` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`patient_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 13
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`patients_alerts`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`patients_alerts` (
  `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `patient_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `alert_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `alert_value` INT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `patient_fk_idx` (`patient_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `alert_fk_idx` (`alert_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `alert_fk`
    FOREIGN KEY (`alert_id`)
    REFERENCES `db_ris`.`alerts` (`alert_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `patient_fk`
    FOREIGN KEY (`patient_id`)
    REFERENCES `db_ris`.`patients` (`patient_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 19
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`roles`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`roles` (
  `role_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`role_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 7
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`users`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`users` (
  `user_id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `email` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `full_name` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `username` VARCHAR(25) NOT NULL,
  `password` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  `enabled` TINYINT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`user_id`),
  UNIQUE INDEX `email_UNIQUE` (`email` ASC) VISIBLE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 8
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `db_ris`.`users_roles`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `db_ris`.`users_roles` (
  `user_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `role_id` INT NOT NULL,
  `id` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  INDEX `user_fk_idx` (`user_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `role_fk_idx` (`role_id` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `role_fk`
    FOREIGN KEY (`role_id`)
    REFERENCES `db_ris`.`roles` (`role_id`),
  CONSTRAINT `user_fk`
    FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`)
    REFERENCES `db_ris`.`users` (`user_id`))
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 112
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;

SET UNIQUE_CHECKS=@OLD_UNIQUE_CHECKS;
